means: <贬>潜伏，偷偷摸摸地走动，鬼鬼祟祟地活动

sentence.Network_en: It's a hard thing to skulk and starve in the heather.
sentence.Network_cn: 躲在树林里的挨饿不是一件好受的事.

sentence.Network_en: This spell is used frequently as people skulk about the castle or the Forbidden Forest.
sentence.Network_cn: 这道魔咒经常被用于帮助那些在城堡或禁林中偷偷游逛的家伙.

The vanquished rooster skulked and hid himself in a quiet corner ., 被征服的公鸡躲藏以外 , 藏在一个安静的角落里.
To skulk around ; sneak ., 潜伏 ; 行为鬼崇.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: of Scandinavian origin; compare with Norwegian skulka 'lurk', and Danish skulke, Swedish skolka 'shirk'

entry.tran: 躲藏;潜伏;躲躲闪闪地走;鬼鬼祟祟地活动
entry.def: If you skulk somewhere, you hide or move around quietly because you do not want to be seen.

example.ex: You, meanwhile, will be skulking in the safety of the car...
example.tran: 与此同时，你会安全地藏在汽车里。

means.word_mean: 1. lie in wait, lie in ambush, behave in a sneaky and secretive manner
2. avoid responsibilities and duties, e.g., by pretending to be ill

sentences.sentence: "The lonely man skulks down the main street all day"

auth_sentence.content: To skulk and hide was to lead a dishonorable life.
auth_sentence.res_content: To skulk and hide was to lead a dishonorable life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To skulk and hide was to lead a dishonorable life.

auth_sentence.content: I don't want to skulk about in secret apartments, as if I were your mistress.
auth_sentence.res_content: I don't want to skulk about in secret apartments, as if I were your mistress.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I don't want to skulk about in secret apartments, as if I were your mistress.
